job.title: Machine Learning Engineer, Zillow Offers
job.description: stronguAbout The TeambrbrustrongZillow Offers is an initiative at the core of Zillows evolution focused on defining the future of real estate Our business seeks to make it simple to buy and sell homes by giving consumers certainty and control and sparing them the tremendous stress of the traditional processbrbrWe are a collaborative passionate team of applied scientists machine learning engineers software engineers amp product managers building the Machine Learning Software that serve as the backbone of the Zillow Offers productbrbrstronguAbout The RolebrbrustrongIn this Machine Learning Engineer role you will partner closely with applied scientists to realize new research breakthroughs in a robust scalable way You will build and deploy machine learningbased software including data engineering pipelines machine learning workflows and inference microservicesbrbrWe are seeking a passionate selfstarter who is equally versed in software engineering best practices and the latest technologies and frameworks for deploying machine learning modelsbrbrIdeally you are interested in growing your machine learning engineering leadership and enjoy being in a fastpaced ambiguous environment This role will collaborate with a team that includes applied scientists data scientists and a product manager You will start remotely due to COVID19brbrOur team is excited for this key hire to join our mission We have committed significant time systems and processes to onboard you in an inclusive and empowering way If this message resonates with you please applybrbrThis role has been categorized as a Remote position Remote employees do not have a permanent corporate office workplace and instead work from a physical location of their choice which must be identified to the Company Employees may live in any of the 50 US States with limited exceptions In certain cases an employee in a remotedesignated job may need to live in a specific region or time zone to support customers or clients as part of their rolebrbrWho you arebrulliRealworld experience building and deploying machine learning andor data systems for example data engineering pipeline for data ingestion and feature extraction machine learning workflow for automatically training and evaluating models a web service for dynamic online inferenceliliWe largely use Python but fluency in Scala Java andor C is also acceptableliliNicetoHavesliliExperience supporting and collaborating with scientistsliliExperience working with product managers real estate partners andor platform teams infrastructure data engineering etcliliExperience working at a large technology company with various stakeholders and decision makersliliExperience building data pipelines with distributed processing frameworks eg Apache SparkliliExperience championing best practices in ML OpsliliFamiliarity with Python scientific stack eg numpy pandasliliExperience working with cloud platforms eg AWS GCP Azure to ship intelligent systemsliliPassion for machine learning engineering and Zillow OffersliliSelfstarter who takes initiative receives feedback well and has a positive attitudebrliulIn addition to a competitive base salary this position is also eligible for equity awards based on factors such as experience performance and locationbrbrGet to know usbrbrZillow is reimagining real estate to make it easier to unlock lifes next chapterbrbrAs the mostvisited real estate website in the United States Zillow and its affiliates offer customers an ondemand experience for selling buying renting or financing with transparency and nearly seamless endtoend service Millions of people visit Zillow and its affiliate sites every month to start their home search and now they can rely on Zillow to help them finish it  and no matter what job youre in you will play a critical role in making this vision a realitybrbrAt Zillow were powered by our innovative and inclusive work culture where everyone has the flexibility support and resources to do the best work of their careers Our efforts to streamline the real estate transaction is supported by our passion to redefine the employee experience a deeprooted culture of innovation a fundamental commitment to Equity and Belonging and uworldclass benefitsu But dont just take our word for it Read our reviews on uGlassdooru and recent recognition from multiple organizations including uFortunes 100 Best Companies to Work For List 2021u Bloomberg GenderEquality Index 2021 Human Rights Campaign HRC Corporate Equity Index and HRCs Best Place to Work for LGBTQ Equality 2021 Fortune Best Workplaces for Technology 2020 Fortune Best Workplaces for Millennials 2020 Fortune Best Workplaces for Parents 2020 and the Deloitte Technology Fast 500brbremZillow Group is an equal opportunity employer committed to fostering an inclusive innovative environment with the best employees We are committed to equal employment opportunity regardless of race color ancestry religion sex national origin sexual orientation age citizenship marital status disability gender identity or Veteran status If you have a disability or special need that requires accommodation please contact us at RecruitingAccessibilityzillowgroupcombrbrememApplicants who receive job offers from Zillow Group will be asked to sign a Proprietary Rights Agreement which includes confidentiality intellectual property assignment customer and employee nonsolicitation and noncompetition provisions If you are contacted for a role at Zillow Group and wish to review a copy of the Proprietary Rights Agreement prior to receiving an offer you may request a copy from your Recruiterem
